pr_title: Implemented Difference-within-range Scrutinizer tests using mocks

timeline.bodyText: The seven lines above could be simplified by introducing a function that takes a List<Snak> and returns a List<SnakGroup> by grouping the snaks with identical properties.
timeline.author: wetneb

timeline.bodyText: This could be pulled up in the ScrutinizerTest base class so that other tests can rely on it as well.
timeline.author: wetneb

timeline.bodyText: Same comment as before: it would be good to try to use meaningful variable names: snakGroupList could be constraintQualifiers, statementList could be constraintDefinitions, and so on :)
timeline.author: wetneb

replies.bodyText:
"There are only two hard things in Computer Science: cache invalidation and naming things."  ~Phil Karlton
And I feel I find the 2nd one extremely hard. Sorry for this again :(
replies.author: darecoder

timeline.message:
Implemented Difference-within-range Scrutinizer tests using mocks

Updated all test cases and added DifferenceWithinRangeConstraint class.
